divs: sighting detailsi have reported this once before to mufon. every night these objects are visible. they appear to be flashing different colors. they move up and down and i have counted as many as seven. i live close to austin bergstrom int.national airport and see many aircraft. these are not aircraft.i think satellites move across the sky.these objects maintain their position.some are as bright as the brightest star and some are less bright,like a dimmer star. i am not aware of any satellites that stay in one position so these may well be some type of satellite. maybe a type of military craft? i have contacted a local news station and have yet to hear from them.other folks have seen them when i point them out,and agree that the objects are flashing and moving. my goal is to find out what they are.i would appreciate any information you can provide.it is obvious that anyone in the austin\bastrop area can see them,yet no one can tell me what they are. will you enlighten me please?
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Bastrop
There were no other sightings in Bastrop on or around September 15th 2013
Summary: starlike,pulsating,like a lighthouse in the sky,moved up and down,various colors
